parameters.name: EndTimestamp
parameters.description: The end time of the query (timestamp).

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description:
Alarm object types:
- GTM_ADDRESS: Address
- GTM_ADDRESS_POOL: Address Pool
- GTM_INSTANCE: Instance
- GTM_MONITOR_TEMPLATE: Health Check Template

parameters.name: Keyword
parameters.description: Search keyword, usually an address ID, address pool ID, domain information, etc.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Language type of the returned information:
- zh-CN: Chinese
- en-US: English

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: Current page number, starting from **1**, default is **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of rows per page when paginating queries, with a maximum value of 100 and a default of 20.

parameters.name: StartTimestamp
parameters.description: The start time of the query (timestamp).
